content: अनुलोम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अनुगतः लोम <ls>P. V. 4. 75.</ls>] {@--1@} ‘With the hair,’ regular, in natural order, successive (<ab>opp.</ab> प्रतिलोम); (hence), favourable, agreeable; °सुखो वायुरनुसारयतीव मां <ls>Rām.</ls>; त्रिरेनामनुलोमामनुमार्ष्टि <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>; °कृष्टं क्षेत्रं प्रतिलोमं कर्षति <ls>Sk.</ls> ploughed in the regular direction. {@--2@} Mixed as a tribe. --मा A woman of the lower caste than that of the man's whom she marries; <ls>Y. 2. 288.</ls> --मं {%<ab>adv.</ab>%} In regular or natural order; प्रतिलोममालिंपेन्नानुलोमं <ls>Suśr.</ls> --माः (<ab>pl.</ab>) Mixed castes.
